channel.title: [C#] String Fold Syntax
channel.description:
I made a good .bat to .exe in c# that could Binds to a file
1. I can only shuffle functions and rename and I made a ASM crypter the ASM one lasted 1 month FUD on Virustotal, stub was hardcoded( each function in sep. string)
2. So, how do i detect variables/functions/api imports, like in ASM.. but in c#
Extending #1, i used C# but it was crappy and only worked with FASM syntax but FUD'ED it well
how would i obfuscate c# code in a c# program, so i can better improve scantime fud
Is there a library for it?
searched up but no hits
